metadata.synopsis: Billy, one of the zombie patrons of the brewer used to be a troubador. Here he is bellowing out a drinking song - may be improvises as a song or chanted.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to Distillery_Brewer_Zombie_03 by the entrance to the distillery.

0.speaker: Blighted Troubador
0.text:
No time to waste, we should be drinkin'
Hey! for the pub
Ho! for the pub
We'll soon be stinkin' drunk!

1.speaker: Blighted Troubador
1.text:
The brew-man's popped, the floors are spattered
Say, hey, for the pub!
Drain your mug like nothing matters
Say, hey, for the pub!

2.speaker: Blighted Troubador
2.text:
The payday gold in my pouch is clinkin'
Say, hey, for the pub!
A single thought is what I'm thinkin'
Say, hey, for the pub!
